name: DGCP MaMeeFarm — Proof 445
description:
This proof documents real-world animal care labor at MaMeeFarm.

The image records the moment of shared maternal nursing between two mother dogs.
Khao Nung gave birth to 5 puppies, and Khao Niew gave birth to 6 puppies.
The puppies are being fed interchangeably by both mothers, demonstrating cooperative care under limited resources.

At the time of this record, Khao Nung is actively nursing the combined litter.
This activity reflects continuous, hands-on care labor performed as part of daily farm life.

Captured at 07:27 AM (local time) on January 6, 2026, this proof represents verifiable caregiving work under the DGCP framework.
